name: Blocky Space
description:
Race through a series of obstacles at high-speed to reach the finish line in nine challenging levels. Two player co-op is the optimal way to enjoy Blocky Space, as it requires not only competition between players but sometimes cooperation to overcome the levels! Game genre? A mix of racing, puzzle and platforming.

Features:

  • Local co-op for two players! Will you compete or cooperate?
  • Interesting obstacle mechanics to discover and master
  • Epic music
  • Minimalist design so you can focus on conquering the levels
